name: arcgis_layer_dependencies
description: Assemble a report containing all the maps on the [Government of BC Maps ArcGIS page](https://governmentofbc.maps.arcgis.com/home/search.html?t=content&q=&focus=maps-webmaps) along with their layers and tags for dependency tracking.
author: Joe Taylor <joseph.taylor@gov.bc.ca>; Yuhan Freeman <yuhan.freeman@gov.bc.ca>
